00002 =                                                                           =
00003 =                               MtkUtcToTai                                 =

00016 
00017 #include "MisrUtil.h"
00018 #include "MisrError.h"
00019 
00032 MTKt_status MtkUtcToTai(
00033   char utc_datetime[MTKd_DATETIME_LEN], 
00034   double *secTAI93  )
00035 {
00036   MTKt_status status_code; /* Return code of this function */
00037   double jdTAI[2];     /* TAI Julian Date equivalent of input time */
00038   double jdUTC[2];     /* UTC Julian Date equivalent of input time */
00039   int scanCheck;        /* checks the return value of sscanf call */
00040   int year;             /* year portion of date */
00041   int month;            /* month portion of date */
00042   int day;              /* day portion of date */
00043   int hours;            /* hours of the given date */
00044   int minutes;          /* minutes of the given date */
00045   double seconds;
00046   
00047   if (secTAI93 == NULL)
00048     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_NULLPTR);
00049     
00050    scanCheck = sscanf(utc_datetime,"%4d-%2d-%2dT%2d:%2d:%lfZ",
00051                      &year, &month, &day, &hours, &minutes, &seconds);
00052   if (scanCheck != 6)
00053     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00054     
00055   if (month < 1 || month > 12)
00056     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00057   
00058   if (hours > 23)
00059      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00060   
00061   if (minutes > 59)
00062      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00063   
00064   if (seconds > 60.99999999)
00065   {
00066     MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);
00067   }
00068   else if (seconds >= 60.0 && (minutes != 59 || hours != 23))
00069      MTK_ERR_CODE_JUMP(MTK_BAD_ARGUMENT);   
00070   
00071   MtkUtcToUtcJd(utc_datetime, jdUTC);
00072   MtkUtcJdToTaiJd(jdUTC, jdTAI);
00073   MtkTaiJdToTai(jdTAI, secTAI93);
00074  
00075   return MTK_SUCCESS;
00076 
00077 ERROR_HANDLE:
00078   return status_code;
00079 }
